articles.title: Jason Aldean Blasts “Cancel Culture” In First Concert Appearance Since “Try That In A Small Town” Music Video Backlash

articles.title: 4 Killed in Helicopter Crash in Remote Alaskan Lake
articles.description: The victims included a pilot and three people who worked for the Alaska Division of Geological and Geophysical Surveys, officials said.
articles.content:
A helicopter carrying a pilot and three passengers who had been conducting field work for an Alaskan government agency crashed on Thursday night, killing all four people on board, the National Transportation Safety Board said on Saturday.

articles.title: The Steep Cost of Ron DeSantis’s Vaccine Turnabout
articles.description: Once a vaccine advocate, the Florida governor lost his enthusiasm for the shot before the Delta wave sent Covid hospitalizations and deaths soaring. It’s a grim chapter he now leaves out of his rosy retelling of his pandemic response.
articles.content: On a Saturday in September 2020, with Covid-19 killing more than 600 Americans daily and hundreds of thousands of deaths still to come, Dr. Deborah L. Birx, a member of the White House coronavirus task force, heard her cellphone ring. It was Dr. Scot... [1202 chars]

articles.title: Mega Millions ramps up to $820M as questions linger over mystery Powerball winner
articles.description: A winning Powerball ticket worth $1.08 billion was sold at this small downtown LA store on Friday owned by the Herrera family.
articles.content:
Mega Millions is living up to its name.
If someone ends up with the grand prize winning ticket for Tuesday’s drawing, they could pocket a cool $820 million.
